quoteText: If you use a third party connection or log-in (e.g., Facebook Connect, Twitter, or Google+) to access the Services, create a membership or profile on any part of the Services, access our content or forward our content to another person, platform or service, we may also receive your username or email address for those third party services or other information available about you or collected from you on those services.
title: The service uses third party tracking pixels to track social media conversion

tosdr.case: The service uses social media cookies/pixels
tosdr.tldr: They receive information about whether you linked your social media account and have access to the information you provide to those social networking sites.
